title: David nwgwrni bwi goaliao
lyrics:
David nwgwrni bwi goaliao
Jisu raja sari… jafwibai -2
‘Okhwrangao mohima jathwng
Be buhumao Shanti jathwng’ -2
(A)
Menda laokhar fwra rongjaswng
Rongja nanwi biswr mwsaglangdwng -2
Halleluiya O Halleluiya . . . .
(B)
Jwngni mondoliao sarifwidw
Jwngni nokhoraobw sarifwidw -2
Halleluiya O Halleluiya . . . .
